types.section:
{{fr-adj}}

# [[inspired]], [[passionate]] (religiously or artistically); ''often construed with'' {{l|fr|de}} (= ''by'')
# [[enthusiastic]]; easily [[inspired]] or [[impassioned]]; ''often construed with'' {{l|fr|de}} (= ''about'')
# [[enthusiastic]], expressing [[enthusiasm]]
types.html:
enthousiaste (plural enthousiastes)

  1. inspired, passionate (religiously or artistically); often construed with de (= by)
  2. enthusiastic; easily inspired or impassioned; often construed with de (= about)
  3. enthusiastic, expressing enthusiasm

enthousiaste m or f by sense (plural enthousiastes)

  1. (often ironic or derogatory) One who is inspired by the Divinity
  2. One who is enthusiastic or fanatical; often construed with de (= about)
trans: One who is inspired by the Divinity
One who is enthusiastic or fanatical
